titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable Sir John Moore Kt. Lord Mayor of the city of London, and the Right Worshipfull the Aldermen his brethren the humble petition and address of the citizens of London, whose names are subscribed, for, and on behalf of themselves, and all other loyal citizens of London.
titleStmt.author: Moore, John, Sir, 1620-1702.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"Moore Mayor ... upon a petition now presented to this court by divers citizens for the calling of a Common Hall to choose another person to be one of the sheriffs ..." part 2 of broadside.
